entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 2:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
